snippet.title: Woman dies in South Australian crash
snippet.content: One woman is dead and another is recovering in hospital following a three-car crash in South Australia. Just after 7pm on Tuesday three cars collided on the Port River expressway, with the 77-year-old driver of one of the cars later dying in hospital. Her 79-year-old passenger was take to hospital with non-life-threatening, but serious, injuries, while the drivers of the two other cars were uninjured. (C) AAP 2017
